channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Several problems i need help with. Please help.
1. When I attack npc's i hit rapdily, how fix? 2. How do i delete/add objects. (Note: I don't have Objects.cfg) 3. How would i make a mage skill cape require no runes? 4. How do i make area's PKable?
Note: Im using the TestScape Source. Its pretty Blank.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2008, 11:15:49 pm[/size][hr]Bump.
